title: Drawing, November 27, 1877
medium: Charcoal, black and white chalk, on gray paper.
signed: Signed with [monogram or initials ?] and dated in charcoal ?, at ?: F. H. S. Nov. 27, 77

Drawing, November 27, 1877.
